articles.title: China markets rise as data shows factory activity grew in June; Asia stocks slip - CNBC
articles.description: Chinese markets rose on Thursday as government data showed factory activity grew in June, but most other Asia-Pacific indexes fell.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Chinese markets rose on Thursday as government data showed factory activity grew in June, but most other Asia-Pacific indexes fell.

articles.title: Court dimisses appeal of woman who tortured maid to death - says she blames anyone but herself - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Gaiyathiri Murugayan, who is serving a 30-year prison term for torturing and ultimately killing her domestic worker from Myanmar, lost her appeal for a lighter sentence on Wednesday (June 29).

articles.title: Big crowds, big dreams: Meet Jeff Ng, the 'Cathay busker' who became a TikTok phenomenon - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: What’s the story behind the Singaporean busker whose performances have gone viral in recent weeks? CNA Lifestyle talked to Jeff Ng, aka JeffHelloMusic, about his musical journey from a cafe to Chinatown, and his plans for the future.
